name: One Gun, Two gunmen.
description:
This game was made for GGJ2022.

Still You have to use keyboard.
(I want to add game pad and mobile in the future)

--Control

The Left Character move: ESDF

The Right Character move: ArrowKey

Throw gun :  Z/ C/ N (I recommend Z)

Restart :  X / V/ M 

--<

Please Enjoy and your Comment!
